metadata.dc:description: Lately, there has been an expansion phenomenon in the use of DNA techniques in criminal investigation. Several of our European neighboring countries are undertaking reforms in this area. However, the proliferation in the use of DNA is hindering a series of guarantees that up until present were considered settled. The exceptions to the judicial due process is an evident example of this trend. Examples of this can be seen in the last interpretation that the Supreme Court has made of the Spanish regulation and the last reform in Germany, both of which we will take a look at

metadata.dc:description: Últimamente se está produciendo un fenómeno de expansión en el uso de las técnicas de ADN en la investigación criminal. En distintos países de nuestro entorno europeo se están dando reformas en tal desarrollando en detrimento de una serie de garantías que hasta fechas recientes se consideraban asentadas. Las excepciones a la reserva judicial son un ejemplo evidente de esta tendencia. Así se aprecia en la interpretación que del ordenamiento español está realizando el Tribunal Supremo y la última reforma en Alemania que comentamos
